column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The parking is is absolutely horrible. It's one way in and one way out. Parking space is really tight. If you're lucky you might get a spot
column2: if not you'll have to scavenge your way around the side street parking for a spot. When you're inside the place is very cool looking. It's very hipster like. Big windows so there is a lot of natural lighting! The food is ok nothing memorable expect for this one amazing pastry. It's called the Kouign Amann. It was delish. The pistachio croissant was ok
